article_title: Collision closes intersection of Oracle and River
article_text:
Tucson Police have issued an alert saying the intersection of Oracle and River is closed in all four directions.

The alert says the midtown intersection will be closed for an unknown length of time.

According to Sgt. Kim Bay, the collision involved two vehicles and a man was taken to the hospital with non-life-threatening injuries.
